tool_description: Validates that technicians possess the required certifications and licenses for specific service types, checking expiration dates and compliance status.

service_date.description: Planned service date for expiration checking

grace_period_days.description: Grace period in days before expiration warning

error_messages: Technician not found: Technician ID does not exist in the system database.
Invalid certification type: One or more required certification types are not recognized.
Invalid service date: Service date must be in valid ISO 8601 format and not in the past.
Grace period out of range: Grace period must be between 0 and 365 days.
usage: Provide technician_id, required_certifications array, and service_date. Optionally set grace_period_days to customize expiration warnings.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non-compliant, expiring-soon

missing_certifications.description: List of required but missing certifications

expiring_certifications.description: List of certifications expiring within grace period

expiration_dates.description: Expiration dates for each relevant certification
